import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import images from "../../assets/images"; import './infoProduct.css'; import "bootstrap" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import request from "../../utils/request"; function InfoProduct(){ // let { id } = useParams(); const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); const id = urlParams.get('id'); console.log(id); const [infoProduct, setInfoProduct] = useState([]); const getInfo = () => { request.get(`/api/infoProduct?id=${id}`) .then(res => { console.log(res.data); }) .catch(e => { console.log(e); }) } useEffect(() => { getInfo(); } , []); return (

{id}

Áo Thun Nam SUPLEX Tshirt Hai Màu Trắng Đen Tay Ngắn Chất Cotton TSSL000

162.400 ₫ 280.000 ₫ 42%
đánh giá số sao

) } export default InfoProduct;
